com.splunk.cloudfwd

Class EventBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.splunk.cloudfwd.EventBatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.splunk.cloudfwd.http.HttpPostable, IEventBatch

    public class EventBatch
extends Object
implements IEventBatch
    Use EventBatch if you want a high degree of control over which events will be sent to HEC in a single HTTP post. Most of the time, there is no need to use an EventBatch, as it is used inside the connection to gather events together when buffering is enabled on the connection.
    Author:
    ghendrey
